    • Field Detail

      • textAreaMaxLength

        public static final int textAreaMaxLength
        Maximum text size in symbols which may be placed in textArea. Text area have very slow behavior when it contains a lot of text
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of value needed to change by timeline
        Parameters:
        prop - The property to which animation should be applied
        toVal - Destination value in the end of animation
        millis - Duration of animation in milliseconds
        cycleCount - Animation cycles count
        ip - The interpolator of animation
